channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: LEC # TOPICS LECTURE NOTES 1 Applications of linear optimization (PDF) 2 Geometry of linear optimization (PDF) 3 Simplex method I (PDF) 4 Simplex method II (PDF) 5 Duality theory I (PDF) 6 Duality theory II (PDF) 7 Sensitivity analysis (PDF) 8 Robust optimization (PDF) 9 Large scale optimization (PDF) 10 Network flows I Courtesy of Prof. Andreas Schulz. Used with permission. (PDF) 11 Network flows II Courtesy of Prof.
